net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource

Interface ResourceAuthenticationDelegate


  • public interface ResourceAuthenticationDelegate
    Provides information to delegate security authenticaton requests. The preferred delegation type is used if possible; otherwise other delegation types are used if supported.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ResourceAuthenticationDelegate.DelegationType
      Delegation type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResourceAuthenticationDelegate.DelegationType getPreferredDelegationType(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource)
      Get the preferred delegation type.
      String redirect(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource, String url)
      Get a redirect URL for authentication.
      boolean service(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource, HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferredDelegationType

        ResourceAuthenticationDelegate.DelegationType getPreferredDelegationType(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource)
        Get the preferred delegation type.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource.
        Returns:
        the preferred delegation type.

      • redirect

        String redirect(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource,
              String url)
        Get a redirect URL for authentication.

        Corresponds to redirect(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource, java.lang.String)

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource that requires authentication.
        url - the resource URL to redirect back.
        Returns:
        the URL of the page offering authentication services or null if one isn't available.

      • service

        boolean service(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource resource,
              HttpServletRequest request,
              HttpServletResponse response)
                throws IOException
        Service the request for authentication.

        Corresponds to service(net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse)

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource.
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        Returns:
        true if the resource servlet should attempt to serve the resource. False indicates the resource servlet should not attempt to serve the resource. This implies that that authentication delegate will send a response to the client.
        Throws:
        IOException - on error.
